attributes.title: the absolute worst app that has ever existed
attributes.review: i really wasn’t looking forward to seeing a cheeto looking pig man eating someone’s toes and feeding them to a horse when i first opened the app. i now see why there is less than two stars on this app it’s truly the worst one out there please do not download it unless you want to be scarred for the rest of your life. i genuinely don’t recommend this app so please do yourself a favor and ⚠️DONT DOWNLOAD⚠️ it for your own good.

attributes.title: DON’T GET THIS HORRIBLE APP🤮
attributes.review: first off as soon as I open the app I had to see his face which made me automatically throw up. Second off it took 17 hours to download. I am out raged by this app and how horrible that work I will not recommend getting it. Not to mention that I got a virus from this app and it was absolutely disgusting and I had to switch my Sim card and phone. I am so disgusted with this service please do not download this app I beg of you.

attributes.userName: FAT CHEETO PUFF IN A WIG HATER
attributes.title: Fat Cheeto puff
attributes.review: This is a disgusting Cheeto puff app in a wig very bad I’m now blind because of this horrible app I thought bleach can help my eyes but it didn’t work so I don’t recommend this app and I saw the same Cheeto puff on twitter naked and getting a spray tan this made me want to pour more bleach into my eyes but I can’t. this is a big fat Cheeto puff wearing a wig disgusts me and I am a VERY holy person so this app should be taken down so holy people can not see this and not make people not bleach their eyes

attributes.title: Worst service eve
attributes.review: Please do not get this app it was the worst app ever that I’ve ever gotten and I don’t really want to throw up there is a disgusting person killing animals and kids I hate to say it but I would rather die to have to download this app or ever see this app one more time in our life let’s get this app the band and never getting here ever again Donald Trump is the worlds worst and he does not deserve to live please God help us worst service ever🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢

attributes.title: Trump 6 feet under ground 😌✨🦋💅🏽
attributes.review: I was really confused why he had a Cheeto as his picture 🤢 . The app looks really bad as if a 2 year old designed it not to mention it was really glitchy and made my phone hot. Later that day I was deleting it and when my dog saw the pic he started throwing up🤮he should just drop out of the election and become the Cheetos mascot but I’d rather not see his saggy turkey neck in front of a Cheetos bag he should just go back to the tanning salon 😌✨💅🏽🦋💕

attributes.title: very harmful and not kid friendly😔
attributes.review: First off, My 5 year old nephew opened the app and there was a porn ad.🤢 ew gross I know. And we kept trying to leave the app but a notification popped up and said “stay and enjoy the porn” and I’m just like no.. I’m a minor. This is very Rated R and not kid friendly I wouldn’t recommend this app to anyone😢🤚🏽it also keeps asking for my location and I don’t feel safe giving that kind of information out

attributes.title: He offered me hot Cheetos but they were poisoned
attributes.review: when I opened the app the man himself popped out of the screen and started yelling at me. He was like “VOTE FOR ME OR I WILL BUY YOUR FAMILY” which is a very unpleasant thing to hear. Next thing I know the fbi is at my door taking away my family. And then they take me. I wake up in the Oval Office, tied up against my parents and my brother. I somehow got out and saved my family but I know this isn’t the last I will see of Cheeto man.

attributes.title: Made me vomit for several hours
attributes.review: Decided to download this app to stay informed, but all it did was cause me deep emotional and physical pain. Mr. Cheeto Poopy Pants was the first image that appeared, and next thing I knew I was in the bathroom throwing up the delicious 5 star meal I had just spent $69 dollars on. This man has taken so much from so many people, and now it is time for this disgusting horrific vile app to be taken away from him, as well as the whole presidency. We don’t want any of it.

attributes.title: insulting
attributes.review: I first opened this app expecting to learn about the campaign. But the minute I did my Alexa starting singing “Trump 2020” in the voice of Tony the Tiger. Then shortly after a truck load of boxes were delivered to my house, filled with copious amounts of Cheetos, spray tan supplies, and blonde wigs that look like they were made for an SNL character. Since then my cat has become possessed and will only eat the shoes of Barbie dolls. Not to mention every morning at 2 AM it shoots lasers out of its eyes.
